src: "Kalo nani ɲinɛw be an bolo sisan sukarɔbana te minw la ni hali kasɔrɔ a tun be ula", a ye fɔ ka o fara a kan.
mt: "I don't know what happened to the pilot, but I think he was unconscious," said a witness.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, kɛnɛya karamɔkɔ Dalhousie sanfɛ kalanso la Halifax, Nova Scotia ani Kanada sukɔrɔbana jɛkulu tɔn kɛnɛyako ni ɲinini cakɛda ɲɛmoko ye lasɔnni kɛ ka yira ko ɲininiw ma ta yɔrɔ jan fɔlɔ.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and Canada's leading expert on the subject, says the study is flawed.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: I nafɔ dɔnnibajolen wƐrƐw, ale ma da ala ka fɔ ko sukarobana  bena se ka furakƐ ka a ban, kƐrƐnkƐrƐnnenyala nin jaabiya ninnu te mɔgɔw kofɔ  minw ni sukarobana suguya 1 ye u ninƐ kaban.
mt: The accident occurred during a training flight, and the pilot was the only person on board.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: TƐnnƐndo, Sara Danius, Siwisi Akademi  Literatire Nobel komite sekeretƐri peremanan, ye  jama ladɔnniya rajo kan jƐmukan dɔ senfƐ Sveriges Radio kan SiyƐde kɔnɔ ko komite in,  a dƐsƐlen ka Bob Dylan yƐrƐlasɔrɔ ka kuma 2016 literatire Nobele jɔnjɔn sɔrɔliko kan, tun ye a weleli ko bolobila.
mt: On Tuesday, Sara Danius, secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee, said in an interview with Swedish Radio that she was "very happy" that Bob Dylan had won the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, despite the fact that he had refused to accept the award.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius ye a fɔ ko, " Ni waati in na sisan, an te ka foyi kɛ. Ne ye nɛkɛ juru ci ani ka bɔlɔlɔ sɛbɛn ci a masuruna baraɲɔgɔnw ma minw ye n' jabi ɲuman na. O be wasakɛ fɔlɔ."
mt: "I'm not sure what happened, but I don't think it was a problem with the plane. I was just about to take off when I saw the fire."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Fɔlɔ, Ring ɲɛma, Jamie Siminoff, tun ye a jateminɛ ko cakɛda in be  dayƐlƐn don min ka da konko kan tun mankan te mɛƐ ale ka ateliye kɔnɔ blon kɔnɔna la.
mt: In 2009, Ring founder Jamie Siminoff appeared on Shark Tank, but was rejected by the panel.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: A ye da konko nɛkɛ WiFi ma dɔ dila, a ye min fɔ .
mt: You can now get free WiFi at the airport, but you have to pay.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff ye a fɔ ko dɔfarala fere kan a bɔlen a bɔlen kɔfɛ Shark Tank ka epizɔdi dɔ la  san 2013 min senfɛ lajɛmukan in ye a ban ka startup kuraw dɔ dɛmɛ.
mt: Siminoff was featured on Shark Tank in 2013, where he pitched his startup company's product.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: San 2017 laban, Siminoff bɔra sanni teleso la QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff sold his company to QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring fana ye kiri dɔ boloda a ni a sinama basikili cakɛda, cakɛda ADT.
mt: The plane was on a training flight from the Air Defense Training School.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Tuma nin ni pikiriji sƐgƐsƐgƐta dɔ be I na fɔ ka bese ka dɔ bɔ Ebola banakisƐ ka maa faa tala, fura fosi ma sɔrɔ  hali sisan fura foyi ma lakodɔn fɔlɔ ka an senkɔrɔ banakisɛw in kɛlɛ.
mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has recommended that countries with Ebola outbreaks should not accept any new arrivals from affected countries, except for aid workers and health officials.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Faarikolo dƐmƐlan jii dɔ, ZMapp, ye jiira ka bese ka nɔbɔ  fɔlɔ kƐnƐkan ye, ɲa kalanw ye a jira ko a nafasɔrɔlen be dɔgɔya ni hakili  be min ma saaya kunbenniko la.
mt: The experimental drug ZMapp, which was used to treat two Americans who contracted Ebola in West Africa, is made from antibodies harvested from lab mice.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM mafilƐli la, ZMapp kƐra ka jateminƐ de ye, a be i nafɔ dɔnnikƐlaw ye a taa ka baarakƐ  ni a ye i nafɔ jateminƐlan ani u ye a sanga furakƐlicogo saba wƐrƐw ma.
mt: PALM is a vaccine, ZMapp is an antiviral, and the latter is not a cure for Ebola.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Jimenasitigi be u ka Komite Olympik ka bataki in jukɔrɔmado ni ka sɔn u ka sigida lakana waleyaw carinin ma an ka farikolo ɲanajɛlaw bɛ kɔsɔ.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee has been criticized for not taking action against the athlete after the incident.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: An sɔnna USOC ka laseli ma min be a yira ko an ka farikolo ɲanajɛlaw ni tɔnw ka nafa, ani u ka farikolo ɲanajɛw, ka kan ka waleya ni yɛlɛmali sira nafamaw ye an ka cakɛda kɔnɔ, ka tɛmɛ jɔyɔrɔ tanɲa ma.
mt: The USOC said it was aware of the situation and was in contact with the athlete, who was not competing, and was not available for comment.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Jiminasitiki be dƐmƐdo ɲinnin kƐrƐnkƐrƐnnen dɔ ma min be na se ka tiɲƐ bange cogo kan  min ka damatƐmƐwale lakalira mabalolenw fƐ ni timinandiya ye cogo min ni Larry Nassar sera ka tƐmƐ ka mƐƐ kasɔrɔ a ma ye  ni ka se ka falenniw kƐ minw tun ka kan ka kƐ.
mt: The U.S. Olympic Committee has been accused of failing to protect athletes from sexual abuse, and of not doing enough to prevent Nassar's crimes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Ameriki Jimnastiki ni USOC ka laɲini bɛ ye keleŋ ye - ka ziminasitiki farikoloɲanajɛ, ani a tɔw bɛ lakanda cogobɛla farikolo ɲanajɛlaw bɛƐ ye walasi u ka se ka u ka miirinaw waleya yɔrɔ jɔnjɔn, ɲuman ani tanɲɛ la.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee and USA Gymnastics have been criticized for their handling of the sexual abuse scandal involving former team doctor Larry Nassar, who was sentenced to 175 years in prison in 2018.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: San 1960 waatiw la, Brzezinski ye baara kɛ Jonh F. Kennedy bolo ina fɔ ladilikƐba ani o kɔfƐ Lindon B. Johnson ka mara kɔnɔn.
mt: In 1960, Brzezinski was an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: San 1976  San 1976 kalataw waatiw la, a be Carter bilasira jamana kɔkan politiki tabolow kan, ani ka laban ka kɛ jamana lakana bilasirali jɔyɔrɔ kƐ ((JLB) ka bɔ san 1977 ka ta san 1981, Henry Kissinger kɔfɛ .
mt: 1976 was a year of political upheaval in the United States, and the election of Jimmy Carter as president in 1976 ushered in a new era of American foreign policy, with Henry Kissinger as Secretary of State.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Ka to NSA la, a ye Carter dɛmɛ ka duniya kɔnɔ kow ɲanabɔli sirawfɛ tigƐ, o dɔ be talikƐ Camp David Bɛnkanw na, san 1978 watiw la, Iran kaw ka mankan, min bankera Iran ma minɛ gɛlɛya la san 1979, ani Afganistan minɛli san 1979.
mt: At the NSA, Carter was briefed on the situation in the Middle East, which had been tense since the 1978 Camp David Accords, and which had become more tense after the Iranian Revolution in 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filimu, Ryan Gosling ni Emma Stone ka farakan, ye sugandira dakun caman la.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, is set for release in December.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ni Stone sugandira ka kɛ filimu bɔlacƐman ani musoma ɲɔgɔn nɔfɛ.
mt: Gosling and Stone star in the film, which is based on a novel by the same name.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Sugantili dɔ ninnu be taali kɛ filimu, filimuɲama, sinenmantogarafi, donfiniw, filimu dilancogo, fɔlikan danma, dilanni hakilina,  mankan sigicogoɲɔgɔnkan, kƐnƐlabarali danma boli bƐƐ la ɲuman.
mt: The film, which is a documentary, is about the making of the film, the film's production, the film's distribution, the film's marketing, the film's release, and the film's reception by the public.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Filimu kɔrɔ dongili filaw, LamƐl¡ (Fatɔw minw be sugo) ani Dolow ka dugu, sugandira ka kɛ dongiliw bɛƐ la ɲuman danma ye. Studio Lionsgate ye  sugandira siɲɛ 26, ka tƐmƐ filimubɔyɔrɔ wƐrƐ kan.
mt: The film, starring Liam Neeson (who plays a retired CIA agent), Julianne Moore and Lupita Nyong'o, is set for release on Nov. 26.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Kari dɔ sufɛ, Ameriki Jamana ɲɛma Donald Trump, kunafoni di dɔ senfɛ, ye laseli kɛ ko Ameriki kɛlɛ cɛw bena segin ka Siri dugukolo kan.
mt: U.S. President Donald Trump, who is in Saudi Arabia, is expected to arrive in Israel later in the day.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Kunnafoni in lasera Trump ni Turki Jamana ɲɛma Recep Tayyip Erdogan ka nɛgɛjuru la kuma kɔfɛ.
mt: Local media reports Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan are meeting in the Oval Office.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turki bena a jɔ fɛnɛ ni ISIS ka kƐlƐden minɛlenw la donni ye minw ni erɔpu jamanaw ye I ban lasegifaso la, kunafoni laseli cogo fƐ,  ne don u ka segin so ma.
mt: Turkey has been bombing ISIS targets in Syria for more than a year, and local media reports that the pilot was captured by Kurdish forces, who are allied with the U.S. against ISIS.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: O be a sɛnbɛntiya dɔrɔn ko jolo tun be dinozɔr nunu dɔw la, kumakan min caarilen don ka ban, ɲa a be ɲƐfɔli dɔw dii ni ni fɛnkɔrɔ te se ka o dii tu ma bɛƐ, ina fɔ suguya ani kƐcogo sigiyɔrɔmasaba hakɛ.
mt: The incident occurred at around 10:30 am local time (0230 UTC) when the plane was on its final approach to land. The pilot was able to land the plane safely, but the aircraft was damaged.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: DɔnnikƐlaw ko ko nin datanfƐn faarikansi tun ɲƐ  ye worojiima de ye a kan ani ɲƐ  ladibilen walima ɲƐ  karotenoyide a kɔrɔla yanfa.
mt: The study found that eating more than 3.5 servings of fruits and vegetables a day, and less than 1.5 servings of red meat, was associated with a 40 percent lower risk of death from all causes.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Nin lakodonni fƐnnƐn be a to kɔnɔw siiko ɲƐtaa ka faamu kaɲƐ kɔsɔbƐ.
mt: The pilot was reported to have been flying a training mission.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Sabula dinosoriw sikalaw ma janya ka ɲƐ, min ni a be wele ko rasi, ɲa siiw kƐcogo wƐrƐw be a ala – siikisƐ ni sii - ɲinninlikƐbaw ye a famu ko rasiw tun be janya ka bɔ u yƐrƐla a cogoya tow kɔfƐ.
mt: The 2010s began with a series of natural disasters, including the 2010 Haiti earthquake, the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami, and Hurricane Sandy in 2012. The 2010s also saw the rise of the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant, which became one of the most active terrorist groups in the world.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Siiw dancogo be mɔgɔ bila ka miiri ko u tun te kƐ ka pannikƐ ɲa ka funteni hakakƐ bƐrƐbƐnni walima ka a jirali.Ɲinnililaw ye u ka halikilina jira ko, halini dinɔsɔridenni de kukala ko do, esantiyɔn in be a kɔrɔbalen sii de jira ɲa jƐgƐfara tƐ.
mt: The plane was carrying 110 passengers and crew, including 10 foreigners, when it crashed. The airline said the plane was on a regular flight from Bangkok to Phuket.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ɲinnilaw ye hakilina do fɔ ko, hali ni dinɔsɔridenni de kodo, nin sugu be kɔrɔbalen sii de jira ɲa jƐgƐfara a tƐ jira.
mt: The plane was on a training mission, and the pilot was the only person on board.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Mugujugu mobili  dɔ binnenjan na o pƐrƐnkan polosiw dagayɔrɔ Gaziantep, Tiriki kɔnɔ, kunu sogoma, ye polosi  mɔgɔ fila faga ani ka mɔgɔ mugan ni ko jogin.
mt: A car bomb exploded in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing at least 10 people and injuring 15 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: MaraɲƐmɔgɔso ko mɔgɔ joginnenw la mɔgɔ tan ni kɔnɔtɔ tun ye polosi barakƐlaw ye.
mt: The accident occurred during a training flight.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polosiw ye a jira ka fɔ ka olu sikalenbƐ Daesh (ISIL) ka kƐlƐcƐ dɔ la min nɔminƐlendo binkanni wale in na.
mt: The Iraqi government has denied reports that the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) has taken control of the city of Ramadi.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: U ye a don ko tile be barakƐ kaɲƐ ni sariya jɔjɔn dow de ye  ina fɔ kalow : Kalow be ka bara sistƐmu tun be don u ka yelen bɔ ta,  rotasiyɔn, ani fosi wƐrƐ.

ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Yelen ni mununmununni be labaara ɲɔngonfƐ ka kalo Rossby hakƐ dɔn, min sirilen do pelasema ji woyoli la.
mt: It is believed that the Rossby waves are responsible for the jet stream's meandering.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Ni Rossby hakƐ ka dɔgɔ kɔsɔbƐ, o cogo kelen in na kalo be kisƐya dɔnin ka kƐɲƐni   maɲetiki yƐlƐmaliw ye.
mt: The Rossby waves are the result of the Coriolis effect, which causes the wind to turn to the right in the Northern Hemisphere and to the left in the Southern Hemisphere.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: A ka taama senfƐ,  Iwasaki  ye gƐlƐya caman sɔrɔ siyƐn caman.
mt: Iwasaki  was also a member of the House of Representatives.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Piratiw ye a suɲƐ, wulufaatɔ dɔ dara a kan Tibet, a yƐrƐɲinnibatɔ bolila ka bɔ furu  dɔ la Nepali,  wa  u ye a minƐ Ɛndi.
mt: The pirates are believed to be from Tibet, and are speaking Nepali, which is similar to Hindi.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Nɔremu 802.11n be barakƐ fiɲƐsira 2,4 Ghz ni 5 Ghz kan.
mt: 802.11n operates in the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Nin be a to a ka se ka waati tƐmƐlenw 802.11a, 802.11b ni 802.11g be ɲɔgontaa, fo a jɔyɔrɔ yƐrƐyƐrƐ ka arajo fila sɔrɔ.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all backward compatible, so a device that supports one of these standards will work with the others.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Teliya 802.11n hakƐ ka telin kɔsɔbƐ dɔnni ka tƐmƐ minw kɔnna a ɲƐ ni 600Mbit/s teliya hakƐ ye.
mt: 802.11n wireless technology can provide up to 600 Mbit/s of data transfer speed.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, min ni ale furulen do ani denkɔrɔba fila be a bolo, ma se ka Miller dabaliban kosɔbƐ, ale min ni a kokɔrɔ in ɲƐfɔra ye.
mt: Duvall, who was also a former mayor, died in a car accident in 2004, Miller said.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Tuma min n'a ɲinigala, Miller ko, "Mike be kuma kɔsɛbɛ lamɛni tuma... N tun be ka n labɛn ola ne tun ma labɛn kɔsɛbɛ k'a mɛn a tun be ka min fɔ"

ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: An bena gɛlɛya anw yɛrɛ kan ka sisifin jinsinni dɔgɔya jaman ka foroba sɔrɔ (GDP) kelen kelen na bɛɛ la ni hakɛ ɲumaba ye k'a daminin san 2020 k'a jigin san 2005 hakɛ duguma.
mt: The government has set a target of increasing the country's gross domestic product (GDP) by 7 percent annually over the next five years, compared to 2005 levels.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: A ma songɔjigin in hakɛ dansigi, ka prƐrƐpƐrƐlatigƐ jiginiw bena sinsin Chine jamana sɔrɔ bɔtaw kan.
mt: The incident occurred during a training flight, and the plane was on a routine flight from China.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu ye ɲetaa jamanaw kɔkɔrɔdɔn "Ka nɔgɔba sɔrɔsira kɔrɔw bali fɔlɔ, k'u lajɛya o kɔfɛ"
mt: "We are not going to allow the country to be destroyed by the fire, we are going to put it out"
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: A y'a fɔ tuguni ko "Nk' u mankan k'u jagoya fɛn na min be ta u ka ɲetaa, jɔyɔrɔ ani se sanfɛ."
mt: "I don't know what happened, but I was flying and then I saw a fire and smoke."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Iraki kalan jɛkulu y’u ka gafe kɔnɔfɛn yira bi nɛgɛ kan 12 cɔyi.
mt: 12 people were killed in a car bomb attack in Iraq.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: A be lasɔmini kɛ ko mɔgɔ Si te sek'a sɛbɛntiya ko ko be senna Iraki jamanan kɔnɔ ni waati in na min be se ka tilannikɛlaw ka kɛlɛ lajɔ, ni binkanni cayali ye walima cɛrɛtin ka sin ciyɛnni ma.
mt: The U.S. military said it was investigating reports that a U.S. airstrike killed civilians in the Iraqi city of Fallujah, and a U.N. official said the death toll could be as high as 800.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Gafe in be dayɛlɛ ni sankɔrɔta ye k'a ɲinsin foroba baro ma ani fɔkabɛn Lameriki jamann kɔnɔ minnu be talikɛ mara taabolow la Azi bangu kɔrɔfɛ jamanaw la.
mt: The U.S. government has been criticized for its failure to provide adequate aid to the victims of the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake and tsunami, which killed over 200,000 people in 12 countries.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Gafe in be lagosili ba kɛ ɲɛnmɔgow ka ni waati mara taabolo fan bɛɛ la k'a ɲɛsin Iraki jamana ma wa ka taabolo yɛlɛmali laɲini kƐ tuma ni tuma jona-jona.
mt: The attack came as Iraqi forces were making gains in the city, which has been under Islamic State control since June 2014.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: A ka laɲini 78 cɛla fɔlɔ ye ka jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔcɛ hakilina kura dɔ ka kan ka ta yani ni san in ka ban walasa ka Iraki jamana dancɛw lakana ka bɔ ladorokoli juguw la walasa ka lasigidenyjuruw lakuray'a na dafɛ jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔcɛ.
mt: 78 people were killed in a car bomb attack in the Iraqi capital Baghdad on Sunday, the first such attack since the country's new government was formed.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Crisrina Fernandez de Krichner, ni ale be wasaden  ya jɔrɔla nin waati la ani Argentine Jamana ɲɛmɔgɔ Muso  yala , y'a ka jamanaɲɛmɔgɔya  ɲini fɔ kunu sufƐ La Plata, n'o ye dugu ye min ni Buenos Aires cɛ ye kilomɛtɛrɛ 50 ye (mayili 31)
mt: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, who was born in the city of La Plata, in the province of Buenos Aires, is 50 years old.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mrs Kirchner y'a kan bɔli ɲɛmɔgɔya ɲini ɲaniya jiira Arizantine kɔtɔbaso la, a y'a ka san 2005 Buenos Aires marabolo wasadenya ɲinini wulikajɔ daminɛ  o yɔrɔ kelen in da la.
mt: Mrs Kirchner was in the country to attend the 2005 Buenos Aires Summit of the Americas, where she was to meet with U.S. President George W. Bush.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Barow ganan ni fɔɲɔgɔkɔ ye min ye ka lafiyada dɔ ci ani yɔrɔw jɔli kuraya fiyɛnkolonba Katrina tɛmɛnen kɔ, nisɔngɔ lasɔnba dɔw y'a tɔgɔ da ni yɛlɛko ye ko Bush New Orleans Benkan
mt: The storm's aftermath left 1,836 people dead and caused $81 billion in damage, making it the costliest natural disaster in U.S. history.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Jɔliko kurayali in timinandiya foroba kɔrɔfɔw y'u sinsin jɔli kura dili saratiw kan k'a di Washington kɔnɔ mɔgɔw ma
mt: The U.S. government has been accused of spying on the United Nations.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: A ka ciya mi mɔgɔ miliyɔn nani ye minnuw taara Rome janaja in na
mt: 1 million people are expected to attend the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Mɔgɔ hakɛ min tun be ye, o tun ta to bɛɛ ka se ka janaja kɛnɛ in lasɔrɔ St. Peter's Square.
mt: The Pope will also celebrate a mass in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Jabara belebele caama tun sigira yɔrɔ caama na Rome walasa mɔgɔw ka se ka janaja in lajɛ
mt: A 28-year-old man was stabbed to death in Rome on Saturday night.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Italy dugu caama wɛrɛw la ani duniya fan tɔw la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnneyala Poland, labɛnni ɲɔgɔnna kelenw kɛra min yera mɔgɔ caama fɛ.
mt: The Italian government has been accused of being too slow to respond to the crisis, with the opposition saying it has been too focused on domestic issues.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Tariku dɔnbagaw ye FBI taabolo kɔrɔw lagosi ka da kan u ye sɔrɔdaw sinsin kow kan minnu ɲɛnɛbɔli ka nɔgɔ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenyala mɔbili suyɛnni ni ɲaniya ye ka cakɛda in ɲɛtaa hakɛ caya.
mt: The FBI is investigating the shooting of a man who was found dead in a car in a parking lot, with a gun in his hand and a bullet in his head.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Wasabulon ya daminɛ ka hakilina nɔgɔlenw musaka san 2005 ani ka pereperelatigɛ ko FBI ka kan ka mɔgɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen 10 ɲɛsin balikuw ka cɛnimusoya jaw ma.
mt: 2005 and the FBI were investigating 10 people in connection with the attack.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa ye bere ndolan bɛɛ la cɛlu sɔrɔ, boli 70 ndolan 41dron na ni gosili nanani 11 ani woroni 2
mt: Robin Uthappa scored 70 runs in 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Camacɛ kulu gosilikɛlaw, Sachin Tendulkkar ani Rahul Dravid ye baara ɲuma kɛ w'u ye kɛmɛ boli jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ
mt: Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid were among the 12 players who were selected for the 2011 Cricket World Cup team.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Nka, u kɛla ka kulu ɲɛmɔgɔ ka cɛluda jɛn, India dron ye boli 36 kɛ ka  cɛluda 7 labila ka bere ndolan in kun cɛ.
mt: 36 people were killed and 7 injured in a drone attack in India.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Etats-Unis jamana ɲɛmɔgɔ Georges W. Bush sera Singapore Nowanburukalo tile 16 sɔgɔma, ka dɔgɔkun kelen taama daminɛ Asia
mt: 16th of September, US President George W. Bush will visit Singapore for the first time, and will attend the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: A fola Singapore minisiri  ɲɛmɔgɔ danga Wong Kan Seng fɛ w'a kumana jago ni balawukɛlɛ kan ni Singapore minisiri  ɲɛmɔgɔ Lee Hsien Loong ye
mt: The Prime Minister of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong, is the son of the first Prime Minister of Singapore, Lee Kuan Yew.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Dɔgɔkun kelen furancɛ kalata ciliw  kɔfɛ, Bush kumana jama dɔ fɛ jago  yiriwali kan Asia
mt: The Bush administration has been accused of ignoring the needs of the poor in favor of the rich in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Minisiri Ɲɛmɔgɔ Stephen Harper sɔnna ka jamana ɲɛmogow ka " Fiyɛn Jɛlen Sariyasen" ci  tɔn-bɛɛ-jɛkulu dɔ ma yasa ka lajƐkura  ye tugun yani a kalan ko filana cɛ, Taratadon sanga 25 ɲɔgɔnye kɔfɛ ni NDP ɲɛmogo Jack Layton ye PMO la.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper's Conservative Party won a majority government in the 2011 federal election, ending four years of Liberal-NDP coalition rule.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton tun ye KɔnsƐrvateriw ka Tɔn ka sigida sariyasen in yɛlɛmani laɲini ani PM ka ɲɔgɔnye senfɛ ka laɲini kɛ  ka sigida sariyasen "bɛɛ segikanni dafalen" kɛ.
mt: Layton said the Conservative Party and the prime minister have been "very clear" that the election will be held on Oct. 14.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Kabini jamana Marabaaw ye u kun do Marsey kɛnɛyaso musakabɔ la Devonport Tasmani jamana na, jamana Marabaaw ni jamana MP dɔw ye lagosili kɛ ni sariyasen in na ko o ye yɛlɛmayɛlɛma ye ni kalata in ɲɛkɔrɔ min be fili Nowamburu kalo la.
mt: The Australian government has announced that it will move the Australian Defence Force's fleet of Collins-class submarines from the city of Devonport in Tasmania to the city of Darwin in the Northern Territory.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Nka Minisiri Ɲɛmɔgɔ John Howard ye a fɔ ko sariyasen in tun ye dɔrɔn marabaaw kana  kɛnɛyaso in daraja jigin ni AUD$ miliyɔn 45 farakan dili ye.
mt: Australian Prime Minister John Howard said the government would spend AUD$45 million to improve security at airports.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Kunnafoni ja labanw na, kɔkɔji hakɛ ye a yira ko  tsunami ko dɔ bɔra ala. Tsunamiw wale tigitigi dɔ jateminɛnna Pago Pago ni Nuie kɛrɛfɛ.
mt: Local media reports a tsunami warning was issued, but the waves were small. The tsunami hit the islands of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tiɲɛnniba ni banaliba si ma lakalen Tonga, nka kuran tun tigɛra waati kunkuruni kɔnɔ min ye a  to Tonga famaw tun te se ka tsunami lasɔmili sɔrɔ ka bɔ PTWC yɔrɔ la.
mt: A tsunami warning was issued for Tonga after a 6.4 magnitude earthquake struck the South Pacific nation.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Hawaii kalanso tanninaani minw be kulusira kɛrɛfɛw  tun bɛɛ datugura Alamisadon hali lasɔminiw  wulilen kɔ.
mt: The Hawaii Department of Transportation said the airport was closed to commercial flights.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Ameriki Jamana Ɲɛmɔgɔ George W. Bush ye kunnafoni in danse
mt: United States President George W. Bush was in town.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush ka laselikɛra Gordon Johndroe ye Worodugu Kore ka weleweleda in tɔgɔda ko "Senɲɛ Kankaran dɔ ka a ɲɛsin Kore nikiliyɛri goni dabilali kuntilenna ɲɛnɛbɔli ma."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the president was "deeply concerned about the situation in the Koreas and is closely monitoring developments."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Atilantiki Fiyɛnkolonbaw tannan tɔgɔdalen, Subtropikal fiyɛnkolonba Jerry, ye a labɛn Atilantiki kɔkɔji kɔnɔ bi.
mt: A tropical storm, Jerry, is expected to become a hurricane in the Atlantic.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Jamana Haurricane Soba (JHS) ko  ko nin waati in na Jerry tƐ ka ciyɛnni si ɲɛsin dugukolo ma.
mt: Hurricane Sandy (JHS) is expected to bring heavy rain and strong winds to the region on Monday.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: U.S ka Ɛnziniyɛri Baarakɛbolo ye a jateminɛ ko sanji inci 6 tun bese ka dɔ fara tiyɛnnen ninnu kan.
mt: 6 inches of snow fell in the U.S. capital, Washington, D.C.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: The Ninth Ward, min fala ji la fo fiti 20 ɲɔgɔnna Hurricane Katrina senfɛ, min ji be cɛkisɛ la ni waati in na inafɔ kɛrɛfɛ kankun fara ka a dama tɛmɛ.
mt: 20 years after Hurricane Katrina, the Ninth Ward is still struggling to recover from the storm's devastation.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Ji be ka tɛmɛ kankun in sanfɛ ni fiti 100 boɲa furancɛ la.
mt: 100 people were killed in the attack.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Wasadenw ka Ɲɛmɔgɔ Adam Cuerden y'a ka jigilatigɛ yira labɔliko nunuw na aka kuma dɔ la Wikimews  fɛ kalo tɛmɛnen in na
mt: Adam Cuerden  has been a Wikimedia News contributor since 2014.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Ale [Wales] ye galɔn tigɛ anw ma kabini a daminɛ. Fɔlɔ, k'a kɛ inafɔ a tun be ka ko kɛ sariyako kun na. Filanan, k'a kɛ inafɔ a tun be k'anw lamɛ, a ka seko nidɔngɔ kofɔli kɔ."'
mt: "I [Wales] am not a member of the royal family. However, I am a member of the royal family. I am not a member of the royal family. I am a member of the royal family."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Sigida in dimini ye ni waati timinandiya lase maracogo dɔ  sɛbɛnni ma min be talikɛ cɛnimusoya kɔnɔfɛnw la ni bɔlɔlɔ siti in kan min be foroba jaw  yamaruyalen miliyɔn caman jatigi
mt: The company said it had sold more than 100 million smartphones in the last quarter.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Baara kɛlen in fanba tun ye hakilinakow ye, nka taabolo in sɛbɛnna walasa ka Sagittarius dolokulu filɛliw sankɔrɔta.
mt: The constellation Sagittarius is visible in the southern hemisphere.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Kulu in ka laɲini nɔ tun ye dolokulu taanikasegin fangaw fɛn fimaw ni dolokulu Milky Way tonkulu fɛn fimaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ
mt: The Milky Way galaxy is one of billions of galaxies in the universe.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Inafɔ kalo be samanifanga lawaleya dugu kolo kan cogo min, n'o be nani samasamani ye, o cogo kelen in de la dolokulu Milky Way be samasamani fanga dɔ lawaleya Sagittarius dolokulu kan.
mt: The Milky Way galaxy is one of billions of galaxies in the universe, and the Sagittarius galaxy is one of hundreds of billions of galaxies in the Milky Way.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Dɔnnikɛlaw sera ka sɛnsɛn ko fɛn fimaw ka ko be se fɛn fima wɛrɛ ma cogo kelen min na fɛn gansanw fana ta be se.
mt: The accident occurred during a training flight.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Hakilinasira in ko fɛn fima fanba dolokulu lamini la be ye dolokulu lamini la kori sugu dɔ kɔnɔ, w'a kɛlendon ni fɛn misɛnmanninw ye.
mt: The accident occurred when the plane was about to land, according to the airport's director.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Jabarani kunnafoniw be sisi jɛɛma yira ka bɔ dilanikɛyɔrɔ in na.
mt: The cause of the crash is not yet known.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Sigida ɲɛmɔgɔw be dilanikɛyɔrɔ in kɛrɛfɛsigisigibaw lasɔnmi  k'u ka to sow kɔnɔ, u ka sosumananw faga ani u ka na robinɛw ji mi.
mt: The plane was carrying 77 passengers and 4 crew members.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Zapɔn kaw ka nikileyɛri cakɛda hakilila Caessium Radioactive ani Iyodini sɔrɔla dilannikɛyɔrɔ in la.
mt: The plant is believed to have released radioactive caesium and iodine into the environment.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Ɲɛmɔgɔw kumana ko ni b'a yira ko iraniyɔmu tajibara dɔw tu pɛrɛnpɛrɛnna kasɔrɔ ka jɛnsɛn.
mt: The plane was on a training mission.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr Tony Moll bɔra sɔgɔsɔgɔnijɛ banasugu kura in kan furaw te se ka min kɛlɛ joona (XDR-TB) Farafinna woroduguyanfan fɛ KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr Tony Moll, a South African doctor, said the country's XDR-TB (extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis) outbreak in KwaZulu-Natal province was the worst he had ever seen.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ɲininkali dɔ senfɛ, a ko banasugu kura in tun ye "gɛlɛma ba ye wa kamanagan ko ye ka d'a kan aka fagata ka ca."
mt: The plane was on a training flight and was "on a normal flight path" when it crashed, the military said.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Banabaatɔ dɔw kelen be sɔrɔ ka banakisɛ in sɔrɔ kɛnɛya so in na, Dr Moll hakili la, wa fila bɔɲɔgɔnko tun ye kɛnɛya so baarakɛlaw ye.
mt: The researchers say the device could be used to detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria, Dr Moll said, adding that the device could be used to detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria, Dr ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
